article_title: New treatment for prostate cancer is much less invasive
article_text:
After skin cancer, prostate cancer is the most common cancer among American men

Instead of using radiation, new treatment uses ultrasound energy to destroy the cancerous tissue

Procedure is much less invasive than surgery and doesn’t have the side effects

article_metadata.news-keywords: prostate cancer, George Suarez, high intensity focused ultrasound, Dr. Dipen Jaysukhial Parekh, UM
article_metadata.description: In October, the FDA approved High Intensity Focused Ultrasound to treat prostate cancer, nearly two decades after it was approved by regulators in Asian and European countries.
article_metadata.title: New treatment for prostate cancer is much less invasive | Miami Herald
